scripts.deploy:prod: echo '🚀 Starting production deployment...' && node scripts/deploy.js production
scripts.deploy:dev: echo '🧪 Starting local deployment test...' && node scripts/deploy.js local
scripts.deploy:test: echo '🧪 Testing deployment pipeline...' && node scripts/test-deployment.js
scripts.d1:migrate: echo '🗄️ Running production migrations...' && wrangler d1 migrations apply decent-cloud-db --config wrangler.prod.jsonc
scripts.d1:migrate:local: echo '🗄️ Running local migrations...' && wrangler d1 migrations apply decent-cloud-db --config wrangler.local.jsonc --local
scripts.d1:status: echo '📊 Migration status: Check deployment output for migration details'
